My congratulations to US President-Elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-Elect @KamalaHarris on your historic #Election2020 win. #Ethiopia looks forward to working closely with you.

Ethiopia’s quest to have a successful transition towards constitutional democracy requires adherence to rule of law. The Government will continue to take necessary law enforcement measures to safeguard & advance our nascent process of democratization from rogue political actors.

Criminal elements cannot escape the rule of law under the guise of seeking reconciliation and a call for dialogue. Our operation aims to end the impunity that has prevailed for far too long and hold accountable individuals and groups under the laws of the land.

Ethiopia has no place for criminal elements. The proud Ethiopian people of Tigray & other citizens cannot be taken hostage by fugitives from justice forever. We shall extract the region of these criminal elements & relaunch our country on a path to sustainable prosperity for all.

Article 51 of FDRE Constitution, listing powers & functions of federal gov’t stipulates that “It shall protect & defend the Constitution”. To discharge this duty the gov’t is taking measures to enforce the rule of law against a clique that attacked our National Defense Forces.1/2

The Federal Gov patiently tried for several months to resolve differences with TPLF leadership peacefully; we tried mediation, reconciliation, dialogue. All failed b/c of TPLF criminal hubris & intransigence. In the last straw TPLF attacked the Northern Command based in Tigray2/2

Operations by federal defence forces underway in Northern #Ethiopia have clear, limited & achievable objectives — to restore the rule of law & the constitutional order, and to safeguard the rights of Ethiopians to lead a peaceful life wherever they are in the country.1/2

Good phone call with PM @AbeShinzo on how we can collaborate in addressing the #COVID19 crisis, particularly the economic and food security challenges that may arise as a result. Our conversation affirmed to me that #Africa has a strong ally post #TICAD and in times of crisis.
As insufficient public health measures can also prolong the economic crisis, we will also invest heavily in the health system as part of our economic responses. 3/3

Ensuring agricultural productivity is also critical to our food security. We will ensure uninterrupted supplies of fertilizers, improved seeds, pesticides to prevent any potential supply shortages. 2/3

To mitigate the adverse impact of #COVID19 on our economy, it is critical to take measures to protect employment and income; scale up safety net programs to the most vulnerable; maintain the supply chain of key commodities and support the productive sectors of the economy. 1/3

If we work collectively, the #COVID19 pandemic will come to pass. Of what we can overcome, we need not believe it will consume us. We will share what we have; we will crossover. Have no doubt that this too shall pass!

No one takes out what they do not already have. So is the heart. It receives what it gives out. To receive, one must first learn to give. We cannot be generous whilst thinking of losses. This is why we can only narrate tales of wealth to be prosperous,rather than that of poverty.

Happy #EasterSunday to all those around the world and in #Ethiopia celebrating per the Gregorian calendar. Amidst the #COVID19 pandemic, may you find resilience and comfort while keeping apart physically but connected in spirit.

Tuned in the context of the growing need for the utilization of #informationandcommunication #technology across all spheres of communication, the law will for the first time establish a clear legal foundation for governmental and private institutions to offer #digitalservices.2/3

Hordoftoota Amantaa Musliimaa Maraaf: baga ayyaana Moolidaa, guyyaa dhaloota Nabi Mahammad tiin (S.A.W) isin gahe. 
Ayyaana Gaarii isiniif hawwa!
Congratulations to my friend @JustinTrudeau for your reelection victory. Wishing you all the best ahead.

I am grateful to all those involved in making the nationwide launch of MEDEMER a success. 

Together towards prosperity.
የመደመር መጽሐፍ ሀገር አቀፍ ምርቃት ለማሳካት ለተሳተፋችሁ ሁሉ ምስጋናዬ ይድረስ።

My condolences to the People and Government of Japan following the deadly typhoon Hagibis. On behalf of Ethiopia, I wish the people of Japan and my friend @AbeShinzo strength during this difficult time.
የጀመርነውን እንጨርስ፣ የተከልነውን እናጠጣ። ተከባክበን ችግኞችን ዛፍ እናድርጋቸው። https://t.co/BJErSmseZo

I am humbled by the decision of the Norwegian Nobel Committee. My deepest gratitude to all committed and working for peace. This award is for Ethiopia and the African continent. We shall prosper in peace!

ማሸነፍ የምንፈልገው ሰዎችን ሳይሆን ማሸነፍ የምንፈልገው ነጋችንን ነው:: 
የጀመርነውን ጨርሰን ሪቫን እንቆርጣለን እንጂ ተስፋ አንቆርጥም::
መልካም የመስቀል በዓል ለሚያከብሩ ኢትዮጵያውያን በሙሉ እመኛለሁ::
I would like to congratulate @KGeorgieva on her selection as Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund. I have no doubt she will bring great leadership to this global institution.

ስንደመር፣ በፍቅር ስንመላለስ ዓለም ያከብረናል።
ኢትዮጵያ ትበለጽጋለች።
ኢትዮጵያ አንድ ሆና ትቀጥላለች። 
ኢትዮጵያን ማንም አያስቆማትም።
I am pleased to have met with the French Minister of Culture @franckriester sent by @EmmanuelMacron. France’s support for the maintenance works of Lalibela Church is appreciated and has commenced.
በመላው ዓለም ለምትገኙ ኢትዮጵያውያን በሙሉ መልካም አዲስ ዓመት እንዲሆንልን እመኛለሁ:: አዲሱ ዘመን 2012 ለሀገራችን ሰላምና ብልጽግና በጋራ የምንተጋበት ይሁን::
